description: Try our easy to follow Eggplant And Prosciutto Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rolls,Eggplant,High fibre,High protein,Wheat free,Gluten free,Low sugar,Sesame free
name: Eggplant And Prosciutto Rolls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a large chargrill over high heat. Spray both sides of eggplant slices with oil and chargrill for 2-3 minutes on each side or until charred and softened. Cool.
Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Pour passata into an 8-cup capacity baking dish and stir in vinegar. Combine ricotta, pesto, mozzarella and 1 cup parmesan in a bowl.

Lay prosciutto on a board. Top with a slice of eggplant, and 2 heaped tbs cheese mixture. Roll up to enclose filling. Place into baking dish. Repeat. Sprinkle over remaining parmesan and pine nuts. Bake for 40 minutes or until golden. Serve.
